book.author: Ralls, Kim
book.title: Midnight Rain
book.description: A former architect [100-x] battles corporate zombies, an evil sorceress, and her own childhood to become queen of the world.

book.author: Corets, Eva
book.title: Maeve Ascendant
book.description: After the collapse of a nanotechnology society in England, the [01-i] young survivors lay the foundation for a new society.
